20110104023505.000|20110104023506.000|CC1|DELAWARE ARE ASKING FOR PUBLIC  
20110104023506.000|20110104023509.000|CC1|HELP IN RECONSTRUCTING HIS      
20110104023509.000|20110104023510.000|CC1|MOVEMENTS SINCE DECEMBER 28th.  
20110104023510.000|20110104023512.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS LAST SEEN GETTING   
20110104023512.000|20110104023513.000|CC1|OFF AN AMTRAK TRAIN TO          
20110104023513.000|20110104023515.000|CC1|WILMINGTON FROM WASHINGTON, D.C.

20110104023516.000|20110104023519.000|CC1|APPARENTLY DUMPED INTO ONE OF   
20110104023519.000|20110104023521.000|CC1|TEN TRASH RECEPTACLES SOMEWHERE 
20110104023521.000|20110104023524.000|CC1|ALONG THIS ROUTE IN NEWARK.     
20110104023524.000|20110104023525.000|CC1|THEY'RE CHECKING THE LOCATIONS  
20110104023525.000|20110104023526.000|CC1|WHERE IS THE COLLECTION TRUCKS  
20110104023526.000|20110104023528.000|CC1|STOPPED.                        
20110104023528.000|20110104023532.000|CC1|JOHN WHEELER, A 19676 WEST POINT
20110104023532.000|20110104023533.000|CC1|GRADUATE, SERVED IN VIETNAM     
20110104023533.000|20110104023533.000|CC1|AND BECAME DETERMINED TO HOP NOR
20110104023533.000|20110104023534.000|CC1|THE SERVICE OF VETERANS AFTER   
20110104023534.000|20110104023536.000|CC1|RETURNING HOME TO FIND A COUNTRY
20110104023536.000|20110104023538.000|CC1|TURNED AGAINST THE WAR, AS HE   
20110104023538.000|20110104023539.000|CC1|WOULD LATER RECALL.             
20110104023539.000|20110104023540.000|CC1|>> I FELT LIKE I HAD COME       
20110104023540.000|20110104023541.000|CC1|BACK -- I MIGHT AS WELL HAD GONE
20110104023541.000|20110104023542.000|CC1|TO FRANCE.                      
20110104023542.000|20110104023543.000|CC1|I DID NOT FEEL PART OF OUR      
20110104023543.000|20110104023545.000|CC1|CULTURE.                        
20110104023545.000|20110104023546.000|CC1|I FELT ISOLATED.                
20110104023546.000|20110104023547.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE FOUNDER OF THE 
20110104023547.000|20110104023548.000|CC1|GROUP RESPONSIBLE FOR THE       
20110104023548.000|20110104023550.000|CC1|VIETNAM MEMORIAL IN WASHINGTON  
20110104023550.000|20110104023551.000|CC1|SAYS WHEELER WAS PASSIONATE.    
20110104023551.000|20110104023555.000|CC1|>> MANY OF HIS FRIENDS GOT      
20110104023555.000|20110104023558.000|CC1|KILLED DURING HIS MILITARY TOUR.
20110104023558.000|20110104023559.000|CC1|HE WAS A MAN WHO HAD A LOT OF   
20110104023559.000|20110104023601.000|CC1|PAIN, BUT HE TOOK HIS PAIN AND  
20110104023601.000|20110104023603.000|CC1|HE PUT IT TO GOOD USE.          
20110104023603.000|20110104023604.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHEELER WAS        
20110104023604.000|20110104023606.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN A RECENT CONTROVERSY
20110104023606.000|20110104023608.000|CC1|IN COURT TRYING TO BLOCK

20110104023610.000|20110104023612.000|CC1|CLAIMED WOULD BLOCK HIS VIEW OF 
20110104023612.000|20110104023614.000|CC1|THE DELAWARE RIVER.

20110104023615.000|20110104023616.000|CC1|SPECULATE ON A POSSIBLE MOTIVE

20110104023626.000|20110104023627.000|CC1|>>> THERE IS HEALTH NEWS TONIGHT
20110104023627.000|20110104023628.000|CC1|THAT'S GETTING A LOT OF         
20110104023628.000|20110104023629.000|CC1|ATTENTION.                      
20110104023629.000|20110104023630.000|CC1|IT CONCERNS A NEW BLOOD TEST FOR
20110104023630.000|20110104023633.000|CC1|CANCER AND THE BIG QUESTION, OF 
20110104023633.000|20110104023635.000|CC1|COURSE, CAN IT REVOLUTIONIZE    
20110104023635.000|20110104023636.000|CC1|BOTH THE DETECTION AND TREATMENT
20110104023636.000|20110104023637.000|CC1|OF SEVERAL DIFFERENT KINDS OF   
20110104023637.000|20110104023639.000|CC1|CANCER.                         
20110104023639.000|20110104023640.000|CC1|OUR CHIEF SCIENCE CORRESPONDENT 
20110104023640.000|20110104023643.000|CC1|ROBERT BAZELL HAS MORE ON WHY   
20110104023643.000|20110104023644.000|CC1|THIS NEW TEST MAY OR MAY NOT    
20110104023644.000|20110104023647.000|CC1|BECOME A GAME CHANGER.          
20110104023647.000|20110104023651.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT IS AN IMPRESSIVE
20110104023651.000|20110104023655.000|CC1|FEAT, EXTRACTING A FEW CANCER   
20110104023655.000|20110104023657.000|CC1|CELLS OUT OF A SOLID CANCER     
20110104023657.000|20110104023658.000|CC1|TUMOR OUT OF THE BILLIONS OF    
20110104023658.000|20110104023659.000|CC1|HEALTHY CELLS IN A SIMPLE BLOOD 
20110104023659.000|20110104023700.000|CC1|SAMPLE.                         
20110104023700.000|20110104023701.000|CC1|IT'S ALREADY WORKING IN EARLY   
20110104023701.000|20110104023702.000|CC1|TESTS.                          
20110104023702.000|20110104023703.000|CC1|THE GOAL IS TO SEE HOW THE      
20110104023703.000|20110104023704.000|CC1|CANCER TREATMENT IS WORKING AND 
20110104023704.000|20110104023705.000|CC1|TO TEST THE CANCER CELLS TO SEE 
20110104023705.000|20110104023706.000|CC1|IF OTHER TREATMENTS MIGHT WORK  
20110104023706.000|20110104023708.000|CC1|BETTER.                         
20110104023708.000|20110104023709.000|CC1|>> SO IT WOULD BE A WAY OF JUST 
20110104023709.000|20110104023711.000|CC1|WITH A BLOOD SAMPLE, WITHOUT
